profile.summary: AI Leader and Cyber Security expert with 25+ years spanning military → academia → industry consulting transition. Author of 4 technical books (Creative Commons licensed), creator of innovative educational AI tools, and pioneer in AI-enhanced pedagogy serving academics, education, agriculture and mining sectors.
